name: The Gorsecaller
description:
The land of Hæth is a magical place full of wonder and small gods. The Gorsecaller is a kith who embraces this sort of magic, understanding plants and the land of Hæth in a way that most kith never will. As they follow this path, Gorsecallers will embody plant-magic more and more but they find wonderful adventure along the way.

Wanderhome is copyright of Possum Creek Games Inc. This product is an independent production by Colin “Mephit James” Wilson and is not affiliated with Possum Creek Games Inc. It is published under the Wanderhome Third Party License.
